para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.0; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto;

table.style: width:300px; cell-padding:4px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:1px; border-spacing:0px; cell-border-width:0px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid; background-color:#eeeeee; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;
